price: Ili msimuabudu isipo kuwa Allah, Mwenyezi Mungu. Hakika mimi kwenu ni mwonyaji na mbashiri nitokae kwake.
arabic: أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّنِي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waongoze watu kwa hii Qur'ani, na uwaambie: Msimuabudu yeyote ila Mwenyezi Mungu tu. Na hakika mimi nimetumwa kutoka kwake ili nikuonyeni msikufuru ikakupateni adhabu yake, na nikupeni bishara njema kuwa mkiamini na mkat'ii, basi mtapata malipo yake..

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: allā taʿbudū illā al-laha innanī lakum min'hu nadhīrun wabashīrun
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
